name: World Circuit
description:
World Circuit is a simulation, sports and racing game developed by MicroProse Software and Geoff Crammond. It came out on 01-10-1992. MicroProse published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play World Circuit on PC.
John Broomhall, Peter Moreland and Steve Perry produced the game. It was scored by David Lowe and John Broomhall.
